latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Economics of Direct Seeding in Northeast Thailand

dsDescriptionValue.value: The objective of the study is to conduct an economic assessment of direct seeding practices in Khon Kaen, northeast Thailand. Specifically, the study aims to compare the economics of direct seeding methods with transplanting methods in rainfed and irrigated environments. It also aims to identify factors that determine adoption of alternative methods of rice establishment.

keywordValue.value: Production Input, Land Use, Land holding, Demographics.

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 173;

value: Districts Nong Rua and Nam Pong
